alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:52AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Mermentau River Near Mermentau For the West Fork of The Calcasie River...including Sam Houston Jones SP...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Goos Ferry Road becomes impassable. Calcasieu River from the Saltwater Barrier to the parish line may be closed to recreational boat traffic. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:35 AM CST Monday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:35 AM CST Monday was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.2 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 4.0 Mon 8 am CST 4.2 4.2 4.1 &&
